author: siew eng
content:
you can also voice your objection to the law by signing the petition to be handed over to nazri before the end of this parliament meeting.


sign the petition: www.tinyurl.com/stop114a
find out more: www.tinyurl.com/stop114afaq
watch, embed, share: www.tinyurl.com/stop114avideo
make it known: #stop114a
strip show: http://stripgenerator.com/strip/660764/youre-already-guilty/
